errors.maxFiles3: Only three files can be attached. Please remove extra files.
errors.maxFiles1: Only one file can be attached. Please remove extra files.

errors.attach-files-error:
The request has been created. The files have not been attached due to the {attachedFileErrors} error.
Try to attach the file again in a few minutes.
If the issue persists, please inform us via the comments to the request. Request ID: {requestId}
errors.comment-attach-files-error: The comment has been created. The files have not been attached due to the  {attachedFileErrors} error. </br> Try to attach the file again in a few minutes. </br>If the issue persists, please inform us via the comments to the request.
